item.title: 尼克-丹顿对美国的大赌注
item.description:
Gawker创始人将赌注押在匈牙利和中国身上。【原文：

The Gawker founder bets on Hungary and China.

item.title: 奇货可居：尼克-丹顿对美国的大赌注（播客）
item.description: 传奇媒体大亨、Gawker 创始人尼克-丹顿（Nick Denton）与美国一刀两断。他将永远离开纽约，与家人搬到布达佩斯附近的布达山。说到他的股票投资组合，他也和美国一刀两断了。在本期播客中，他告诉我们为什么他看好中国，并表示埃隆-马斯克的陨落可能是全世界最大的商业故事。我们还讨论了大西洋主义梦想的终结，以及欧洲精英为何变得如此保守。【原文：Legendary media mogul Nick Denton, the founder of Gawker, is done with the US. He’s leaving New York City for good, and moving with his family to the Buda Hills near Budapest. And when it comes to his stock portfolio, he’s done with the US as well. On this episode of the podcast, he tells us why he’s bullish on China, and says that the fall of Elon Musk may be the biggest business story in the entire world. We also talk about the end of the Atlanticist dream, why European elites are turning so s】

item.title: 关税威胁削弱本季度强劲表现，欧洲股市下跌
item.description: 由于美国新一轮关税威胁打击了受贸易紧张局势影响最大的股票，欧洲股市连续第四个交易日下跌。【原文：European stocks fell for a fourth straight session as the threat of a fresh wave of US tariffs hit stocks most exposed to trade tensions.】

item.title: 维托尔支持的瓦罗公司同意收购 Preem 公司，押注可再生燃料领域
item.description: 欧洲炼油企业瓦罗能源公司（Varo Energy）已同意收购 Preem AB 公司，这将使该公司成为该地区第二大可再生燃料生产商。【原文：European refiner Varo Energy has agreed to buy Preem AB, in a deal that will make it the region’s second-largest renewable fuel producer.】

item.title: 中国银行提高消费贷款利率以保护利润率
item.description: 中国各家银行在将消费贷款利率降至历史最低点约两周后，又开始上调利率，这凸显了在利润率持续承压的情况下降低融资成本所面临的挑战。【原文：Chinese banks have begun raising consumer loan interest rates just about two weeks after cutting them to record lows, underscoring the challenges of lowering funding costs amid sustained pressure on margins.】

item.title: ABBA 明星和 EQT 创始人为新音乐基金筹资 10 亿欧元
item.description: 一家由 ABBA 明星比约恩-乌尔瓦尤斯（Bjorn Ulvaeus）共同创办的瑞典投资公司为其首支音乐基金募集了 10 亿欧元（11 亿美元）资金，此举凸显了投资者对合适资产的深度需求。【原文：A Swedish investment firm co-founded by ABBA star Bjorn Ulvaeus raised €1 billion ($1.1 billion) for its first music fund in a move underscoring the depth of investor demand for the right kind of assets.】

item.title: 受贸易战和增长风险影响，全球市场本季度表现不佳
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的破坏性贸易政策和不断加剧的滞胀担忧，使投资者趋于避险，市场过山车式的一季度在结束时几乎没有得到缓解。【原文：A roller-coaster quarter for markets is ending with little relief, as President Donald Trump’s disruptive trade policies and rising stagflation fears drive investors toward risk aversion.】

item.title: 高盛因增长风险第二次下调 S&P 500 指数目标值
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategists cut their S&P 500 target for a second time this month, citing a higher recession risk and tariff-related uncertainty.】

item.title: 欧洲关税忧虑暂时削弱了市场对国防的乐观情绪
item.description: 由于对即将到来的关税的担忧超过了德国国防支出计划所带来的乐观情绪，欧洲市场的气氛骤然转变。【原文：The mood music in European markets has abruptly shifted, as concerns over imminent tariffs outweigh optimism driven by Germany’s defense-driven spending package.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德称控制通胀是一场 "持久战
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，在美国政府的贸易政策带来不确定性的情况下，欧洲央行在通胀问题上不能松懈。【原文：President Christine Lagarde said that the European Central Bank can’t relent on inflation, with the US administration’s trade policy creating uncertainty.】

item.title: 阿斯顿-马丁将通过出售股票和 F1 股份筹集更多现金
item.description: 阿斯顿-马丁拉贡达全球控股公司（Aston Martin Lagonda Global Holdings Plc）希望通过向加拿大亿万富翁劳伦斯-斯特罗尔（Lawrence Stroll）出售更多股份及其在一级方程式赛车队中的少数股权，筹集至少1.25亿英镑（1.62亿美元）的资金。【原文：Aston Martin Lagonda Global Holdings Plc expects to raise at least £125 million ($162 million) by selling more shares to Canadian billionaire Lawrence Stroll and its minority stake in the Formula One racing team.】

item.title: 伊朗领导人承诺对美国和以色列做出 "坚决的报复性回应
item.description: 伊朗最高领袖阿亚图拉-阿里-哈梅内伊（Ayatollah Ali Khamenei）表示，美国或以色列的任何攻击都将遭到 "坚决的报复性打击"，此前美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁称，除非伊朗签署放弃核武器的协议，否则将轰炸伊朗。【原文：Iran’s Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei said any attack by the US or Israel would be met with “a firm retaliatory strike,” after US President Donald Trump threatened to bomb Iran unless it signs a deal renouncing nuclear weapons.】

item.title: RWE 将向挪威基金出售两个海上项目 49% 的股份
item.description: 德国能源公司 RWE AG 与挪威银行投资管理公司签署了一项协议，后者将收购两个北海风电项目 49% 的股份。【原文：German energy company RWE AG signed an agreement with Norges Bank Investment Management for the latter to acquire a 49% stake in two North Sea wind projects.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司选择 KKR 作为扭亏为盈的潜在合作伙伴
item.description: 泰晤士河水务公司选择 KKR & Co.公司作为首选合作伙伴，进入所谓的股权程序第二阶段尽职调查阶段。【原文：Thames Water selected KKR & Co. to enter the so-called Phase 2 diligence stage of its equity process as the preferred partner.】

item.title: 泰国发生致命地震后前景黯淡，降息可能性增加
item.description: 据分析师称，3 月 28 日缅甸发生致命地震后，泰国的经济前景正在恶化，这增加了下个月再次降息以支持疲软经济的压力。【原文：Thailand’s economic outlook is worsening after the deadly March 28 Myanmar earthquake, adding to pressure for another interest rate cut next month to support the sluggish economy, according to analysts.】

item.title: 关税担忧加剧，股市将下跌
中国国有汽车制造商合并报告发布后股价上涨
item.description: 有报道称，在市场面临挑战的情况下，中国政府正计划对汽车行业进行兼并和重组，随后中国国有汽车制造商的股票纷纷上涨。【原文：Shares of Chinese state-owned carmakers rose after a report that the government is planning mergers and restructuring in the sector amid challenges for the market.】

item.title: EQT 财团提出以 45 亿美元收购 Fortnox
item.description: 包括 EQT AB 管理的一家基金在内的一个财团提出收购瑞典金融服务公司 Fortnox AB，交易价值为 445 亿克朗（45 亿美元）。【原文：A consortium including a fund managed by EQT AB has offered to buy Swedish financial services firm Fortnox AB in a deal valued at 44.5 billion kronor ($4.5 billion).】

item.title: 马斯克认为特斯拉是一个 "购买机会"，尽管遭到了 DOGE 的反击
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）承认，作为唐纳德-特朗普总统削减政府规模努力的负责人，他的工作 "让我损失惨重"。【原文：Elon Musk acknowledged that his job as head of President Donald Trump’s effort to cut the size of government is “costing me a lot” when it comes to his other big job, as CEO of Tesla Inc.】

item.title: 韩国的卖空禁令已经结束。全球投资者会蜂拥而至吗？
item.description: 3 月 31 日，全球对冲基金和银行使用的卖空交易策略禁令解除，韩国 1.7 万亿美元的股票市场再次对卖空交易开放。【原文：South Korea’s $1.7 trillion stock market is once again open to short selling, after the ban on the trading tactic used by hedge funds and banks around the world was lifted on March 31.】

item.title: 日本将在新财政年度开始前一天批准预算案
item.description: 日本国会将通过一份经过多次修改的初步预算案，从而减轻首相石破茂在面临一系列国内和外交挑战时所承受的部分压力。【原文：Japan’s parliament is set to pass an initial budget after multiple revisions, easing some of the pressure on Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba as he faces a host of domestic and diplomatic challenges.】

item.title: 中国数据公布后新兴货币保持稳定，美国关税受到关注
item.description: 新兴市场货币在早盘交易中持稳，因为有迹象表明中国经济正在企稳，这抵消了对本周美国将征收下一轮关税的忧虑。【原文：Emerging-market currencies were steady in early trading as signs China’s economy is stabilizing offset angst over the next round of US tariffs due this week.】

item.description:

item.title: 据说北京华联即将向博宇出售豪华 SKP 商场
item.description: 据知情人士透露，北京华联集团投资控股有限公司（Beijing Hualian Group Investment Holding Co.【原文：Beijing Hualian Group Investment Holding Co. is in talks to sell its business that operates and develops luxury malls in China to Boyu Capital, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 李嘉诚考虑推迟港口交易，长江和记股价下跌
item.description: 长江和记控股有限公司（CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd.）的股价创下近两周以来的最大跌幅，此前有消息称，其香港亿万富翁老板李嘉诚正在考虑推迟签署一项有争议的交易，即向包括贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd.’s shares dropped by the most in nearly two weeks following news its Hong Kong billionaire owner Li Ka-shing is considering delaying the signing of a controversial deal to sell his Panama Canal ports to a consortium including BlackRock Inc.】

item.title: 台湾股市在大范围下跌中走向修正
item.description: 周一，台湾股市因关税引发的大跌而遭受重创，其基准指数有望从近期高点下跌超过 10%，交易商称之为技术性修正。【原文：Taiwan’s battered stock market got caught up in a tariff-fueled selloff on Monday, putting its benchmark on track to close more than 10% down from a recent high — what traders call a technical correction.】

item.title: 淡马锡和 GIC 据称将在与 TPG 的交易中购买 Novotech 股份
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，淡马锡控股私人有限公司（Temasek Holdings Pte）和新加坡政府投资有限公司（GIC Pte Ltd）将收购 Novotech 私人有限公司的大量股份，以促进这家临床研究与测试提供商的发展并加快收购步伐，该公司的估值约为 30 亿澳元（19 亿美元）。【原文：Temasek Holdings Pte and GIC Pte Ltd. will acquire a significant stake in Novotech Pty Ltd. to fuel growth and accelerate acquisitions for the clinical research and testing provider, valuing the company at about A$3 billion ($1.9 billion), people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 马斯克的 XAI 交易为 X 投资者带来意外收获
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克刚刚在三年内第二次收购了社交网络 Twitter 的前身。【原文：Elon Musk just acquired the social network formerly known as Twitter for the second time in three years.】

item.title: 泰国地震后市场重新开放，向投资者作出保证
item.description: 周五发生的大地震造成建筑物大面积损坏，并导致约 18 人死亡，泰国当局在证券交易所准备恢复交易时，努力安抚投资者的情绪。【原文：Thai authorities sought to calm investor nerves as the stock exchange prepared to resume trading after a massive earthquake on Friday caused widespread damage to buildings and killed about 18 people.】
